update course_audit set name=#{name}, author= #{author}, price=#{price}, description= #{description}, image_url=#{imageUrl}, content_url=#{contentUrl}, statu=#{statu}, checked=#{checked} where course_id = #{courseId};
mapper.select: select c.course_id, u.username, c.name, c.author, c.price, c.description, c.sub_name, c.image_url, c.content_url, c.update_time from user u join course_audit c on u.user_id = c.user_id where c.statu = 2 and c.checked = 0;
